Food Photography & Styling

Learn Food photography/styling in London

Food Photography/Styling

Your local friend:

Zandra

About:

Zandra is a London/Berlin based foodie, drawn to people, beautiful food and crazy about tea. Former pastry chef who trained in a UK Michelin starred restaurant.

Course Details:

Location: London, U.K.

Duration: 1 day, 8 hours

Level: Beginner

Price: 100 GBP

What you'll learn:

Learn how to take beautiful food pictues and how you can style your food shots. You will learn about lighthing and how to create depth using your smartphone.

Where we'll be:

Notting Hill Farmers Market, London

What I'll provide:

I will provide you with my best tips on how to take great food pictures, how to play with colors and how to edit them using free apps.

Good to know

Make sure you bring your smartphone and have enough storage for taking pictures and downloading apps.

Where we'll meet:

Notting Hill Farmers Market, London
